duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate and maintain furnaces and other equipment to produce fluoride materials
Accurately weigh, mix, and transfer chemicals before and after processing
Follow chemical safety protocols, including wearing proper personal protective equipment and understanding safety data sheets
Handle hazardous materials, including concentrated acids and bases
Monitor equipment, including valves and pressure readings, and respond to alarm signals to ensure safe and proper operation
Maintain organized records, including data logs, chemical inventory
Assist engineering with ongoing process development and improvements
Support other activities in the R&D and Crystal Growth departments, as needed
Provide clear communication across shifts, including production, facilities, and environmental health and safety

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent required
2-4 years’ experience in chemical processing or in a wet lab is required
